data.name: WRC 6 - Calendar and WRC + Pack
data.detailed_description:
This content pack for WRC 6 contains:
  • The official digital World Rally Championship calendar. From McKlein, the official WRC photographer, this calendar is a collection of the best photos of the season.
  • 3 months' free access to WRC +, the official platform for World Rally Championship videos. Watch live or relive the best moments of the championship using your access code*.

This content will be automatically downloaded to [your Steam installation directory]\SteamApps\common\WRC 6\DeluxeContent

*Code valid until 31/11/2017, for a period of 3 months from the date of activation.
